name: 死者漂流 (Dead Witch in Night Sky)
name_original: 死者漂流 (Dead Witch in Night Sky)
description:
This game uses autosave. When reopening the game, use the arrow keys at the load screen to select a chapter and press 'Enter'

Recommended to play in a 4:3 resolution

Story and Art by James Cooper

Music by telepath  (CC BY-NC 3.0)
